title: [Sherlock] Create the Composable AI Operations Manual Chapters
description: Deconstruct existing documentation into granular chapter files within 'docs/manual_chapters/'. Create the master index file 'docs/AI_OPERATIONS_MANUAL.md' that lists these chapters in order.
acceptance_criteria: Create individual, granular chapter files (e.g., '01_vision.md') by migrating and refactoring content from old docs.
Create the 'docs/AI_OPERATIONS_MANUAL.md' file to act as an ordered index of the chapter files.
Deprecate or remove the old, now-redundant documentation files.
